dialogue.htmlContent: hey npc, i know we've only known each other for a short while, but I really enjoy spending time with you. You're really hot, handsome, kind, and you know how to show a [pc.guy] a good time. This is hard for even me to say, but I really like you, will you be my boyfriend? Look son, you may be an adult, but you'll always be my precious little boy, and I will always love you. How about I give you one of [pc.daddy]'s make-everything-better kisses, you say, taking your son's head in your hands and placing a kiss on his forehead
